attributes.action: Stop the budget destroying the UK farming sector
attributes.additional_details:
The government made all the promises under the sun that they would support us and back British farm and use haven't use have destroyed it for the next generation. 

No farmers, No Food, No Future
attributes.background: We want the UK government to come to their senses and not reform the APR or BPR as this will destroy the UK agricultural sector and destroy Family Farms

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
